# 9.0 Docs

## SDK and MSBuild

- [`dotnet sln add` doesn't allow invalid file names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/dotnet-sln.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET SDK where the CLI command 'dotnet sln add' adds support for .slnx solution files and no longer allows invalid file names.
- [`dotnet watch` incompatible with Hot Reload for old frameworks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/dotnet-watch.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 9 SDK where 'dotnet watch' requires disabling Hot Reload for projects targeting .NET 5 or earlier.
- [`dotnet workload` commands output change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/dotnet-workload-output.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 9 SDK where the `dotnet workload` commands output only the JSON body.
- [`installer` repo version no longer documented](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/productcommits-versions.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 9 SDK where the `installer` repo commit and version are no longer included in the `productcommits` files.
- [New default RID used when targeting .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/default-rid.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 9 SDK where a new default RID is used for apps that target .NET Framework.
- [Terminal logger is default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/terminal-logger.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 9 SDK where Terminal Logger is used by default for interactive MSBuild invocations.
- [Version requirements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/version-requirements.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 9 SDK where specific versions of Visual Studio and MSBuild are required.
- [Warning emitted for .NET Standard 1.x targets](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/netstandard-warning.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 9 SDK where the a build warning is produced if your project targets any .NET Standard version below 2.0.
- [Warning emitted for .NET 7 target](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/9.0/net70-warning.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET SDK where a warning is issued for apps that target net7.0, which is out of support.
